page.title: 09Housing in the Area.
page.content:
area that houses have gas central heating.Four houses have electric and eight homes have oil central heating. Out of the{104}questionaires returned a total of{256}people resided in the houses including 42 children under the age of 16 years. 41% of the residents were born in the village.
The larger community of{Cwmavon}has grown considerably since the Second World War and contains many new Housing Estates, both Council owned and private. One of the largest private estates is known as Pine Valley. Many of the older houses have been pulled down and modern houses built in their place.
